ext_description.message: Manage your games in progress, and add many visual enhancements (dark mode, etc.).

report_error.message: You can report this error on the forum.

report_error_ff.message: Please make sure that all permissions have been granted to the extension (right-click on the extension icon, then ‚ÄúManage extension‚Äù and go to the ‚ÄúPermissions‚Äù tab). If you are unable to correct this error, please let us know on the forum.

optionFriendsActivityOn.message: The friends' activity is displayed in game logs

optionFriendsActivityOff.message: The friends' activity is hidden in game logs

optionEloHiddenOn.message: Players' ELO scores are hidden in games

optionEloHiddenOff.message: Players' ELO scores are displayed in games

optionFloatingGame.message: In a floating menu (only for this game)

optionFloatingAlways.message: In a floating menu (for all games)

optionCssTitle.message: Customize site appearance with CSS code

optionsClearHiddenGames.message: Clear the list of hidden games

optionsClearHiddenGamesConfirm.message: The contents of the above list will be deleted

optionHiddenGamesWarning.message: Remove a game from this list to display it on Board Game Arena. (You must reload the page for the changes to be effective)

optionMutedWarning.message: You can mute up to 10 players. Remove a player from this list to stop mute them.

optionNavigationWarning.message: Warning: only change the configuration on this screen if you really know what you're doing ;)

reportCreationWarning.message: You're using a browser extension that significantly alters the visuals of the site and certain games. If you have a problem with one of the extension's features, please don't create a report, come and talk about it on the forum!

reportCreationWarningCss.message: You've also modified the CSS code of the site via the extension options, so please check first that your problems aren't caused by your customisations.

search_games_friends.message: Search for an open table created by a friend or one of your group members.

optionsTrackingOn.message: Tables status notification enabled (other players see you online)

optionsNotificationSoundOn.message: Sound notification when you are expected on at least one table

optionsFlashingOn.message: Tables on which you are awaited are indicated by a flashing color

optionsFlashingOff.message: Tables where you are expected are indicated by a color code and a message

optionsLobbyRedirectOn.message: Hyperlinks are modified to point to the classic lobby (when possible)

optionsLobbyRedirectOff.message: Hyperlinks are not modified, the default lobby is used (usually the new one).

optionsAutoOpenOn.message: The 'Fast create' button automatically opens the table to other players

optionsAutoOpenOff.message: The 'Fast create' button does not open the table to other players

optionsSolidBackgroundOn.message: The default background (wooden planks) is replaced by a solid-colored background

optionsHideSocialMessagesOn.message: News feed contains only groups messages [BETA]

aboutText.message:
You can consult the help page of this extension on this page.

You can also come and chat with the authors on the forum, tell us about your concerns and make suggestions, or why not just drop us a little word of encouragement. üôÇ

And if you like this extension, you can buy me a cup of coffee ‚òï.

Thanks !

deleteGameText1.message: The game will no longer appear in the game list or lobby.

deleteGameText2.message: This is not a feature of the Board Game Arena site, but an add-on managed by an extension you've installed.

deleteGameText3.message: You can cancel the deletion of a game in the extension options.

deleteStop.message: Do not display this message again

fastStartText1.message: The game will be started with the default settings (and automatically opened to other players if you've set this option).

muteText1.message: You will no longer receive messages from ignored players in game conversations. You can mute up to 10 players and manage the ignore list in the extension options.

muteWarningOn.message: Tell other players about your decision to mute a player.

muteWarningOff.message: Do not tell other players about your decision to mute a player.

optionsHomeRefresh.message: If the display becomes weird after a configuration change, try reloading the page.

infosSubTitleChrome.message: Thank you for using the BGA Chrome Extension!

infosSubTitleFirefox.message: Thank you for using the BGA Firefox Extension!

infosLine1.message: Are you up to date with the latest features added to this extension?

infosLine2.message: For example, the addition of the ability to block a user in a game chat, or the ability to define an HTML template for the display of home page elements?

infosLine3.message: If you'd like to be kept up to date on the next new features added to the extension, you can join the Browser Extension Users group, and you'll get news in the homepage news feed.

infosLine4.message: Of course, you can also check out the extension features at any time and come and chat with the authors on the forum.
